__comment: The Crossroads was an embassy building challenge event along with the election to choose either ElderShrimp or Teethbones for Regent of Exorsa. 4/3/2021

description.text: Amid public uncertainty about the leadership in Atrocity, the feud between the Forks and Knives districts of Atrocity has come to a head; Each of the Twin Mayors of Atrocity is running their own campaign for Regent of Exorsa.
